products.title: Origin Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the colour-matched cords that hang from the sides. The beauty of the brushed silver is that it can be used as part of a room's central colour scheme, or incorporated as a simple accent, in the same way as a fixture or fitting might.

products.title: Origin Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark slate in colour, the origin grey is comprised of satin-finish, heavy gauge aluminium slats, high quality pull-cords, and a clear wand tilt, resulting in a streamlined, contemporary blind. Given that the grey shade will match a multitude of hues, this is an obvious choice for those who like to change their dcor often. Go industrial in the kitchen by pairing the grey with worn metals, rustic woods, and slate floor tiles.

products.title: Origin City Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: City grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home. The steely character of the grey is softened by the sleek finishing and smooth surfaces of the wooden slats to create a homely addition that will enhance any space. Origin, city grey - venetian blind city grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home.

products.title: Origin Pewter - Day Night Blind
products.description: The fabric of the slate grey origin pewter is sleek and modern, allowing for a clean and streamlined look and easy workability. The controls and brackets are tucked neatly into the overhead rail cassette, affording the blind extra tidiness and attractiveness. Place the pewter against pure white walls in the living room and add matching grey throws and cushions throughout the room. Choose a bright shade, such as zesty lime, funky satsuma, or cobalt blue, to add bursts of colour throughout the room.

products.title: Origin Taupe Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: In a delicate stone shade, the origin taupe grey is subtle and unassuming. Its clean, contemporary fabric has a smooth, touchable texture and is double-layered to home netted strips that can be raised and lowered to allow more or less light into the room. Create an industrial look in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the taupe grey amidst cobalt blue or slate grey walls, perhaps including a brick-look wallpaper for a fun effect.

products.title: Origin Medium Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: A contemporary shade of grey, the origin's medium grey is sleek and clean with an industrial edge. For complete versatility, the sliding strip of netting can be moved up and down to allow more or less light into the room whilst still retaining privacy. Use the medium grey as part of a strong, moody dcor scheme in an older child's bedroom, framing it with stark white or pale grey walls. Add distinctive metallic furniture, in materials such as steel and wire, to add a real sense of style to the room.

products.title: Origin Charcoal Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Charcoal grey is a powerful and eye-catching tone that will inject a presence into any room or space. The earthy quality of the colour is matched beautifully by the minimalist finishing of the slats to create a simple yet striking visual that captures the eye the moment you enter. Origin, charcoal grey - venetian blind charcoal grey is a powerful and eye-catching tone that will inject a presence into any room or space.

products.title: Origin Deluxe City Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor. The depth and striking finish of the steely grey work in perfect harmony with the gently crafted wooden slats and the assortment of unique complimentary fixtures and features. Origin deluxe, city grey - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor.

products.title: Origin Deluxe Charcoal Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing. By bringing the two together in perfect harmony, and adding a selection of easy on the eye fixtures, it creates a striking visual that will set the tone for the rest of your decor. Origin deluxe, charcoal grey - venetian blind charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing.

products.title: Origin Grey - Vista Blind
products.description: Origin grey brings a modern light stone grey into your home and combines it with the clean and clear lines that only a contemporary vista blind can provide. Finely woven and expertly crafted, no matter how discerning your eye is you are guaranteed to appreciate the workmanship that goes into every square inch. The ability to give your room the perfect light levels all day long makes your kitchen a fantastic choice for origin grey.

products.title: Origin Taupe - Vista Blind
products.description: A light beige fabric sits harmoniously below a matching voile to create the latest addition to their range of vista blinds. Lightweight and elegantly poised, every square inch is crafted with care to ensure that you add nothing but understated luxury to your home. If you want to give your home a touch of rustic country with a modern twist there is no better addition to make to your home than origin taupe.
